Description.Text: Situated on the shores of Las Canteras Beach with direct access to endless local attractions is the four-star NH Imperial Playa. A short walk, or a quick ride on the city's well-developed public transportation system, will bring you to some of the area's most popular destinations--from shopping centers to museums; concert halls to nightclubs. Or, take a five-minute taxi ride to Las Palmas' historic center--a lively nightlife hub and nominated UNESCO World Heritage Site. Those who desire a vacation filled with sand, sun and the warm waters of the Atlantic will find everything they're looking for right outside the doors. Each of our 142 guest rooms at the NH Imperial Playa hotel provide a cozy, contemporary retreat with plush bedding, a luxurious bathroom and all the comforts of home, including a TV, free wireless internet access and a minibar. Enjoy exceptional local and international cuisine with a side of stunning sea views in our world-class restaurant. And, with four convention halls offering room for up to 200 people, the NH Imperial Playa makes an excellent locale for meetings, weddings and private events of all kinds. The hotel has no smoking policy.

Situated on the shores of Las Canteras Beach with direct access to endless local attractions is the four-star NH Imperial Playa. A short walk, or a quick ride on the city's well-developed public transportation system, will bring you to some of the area's most popular destinations--from shopping centers to museums; concert halls to nightclubs. Or, take a five-minute taxi ride to Las Palmas' historic center - a lively nightlife hub and nominated UNESCO World Heritage Site. Those who desire a vacation filled with sand, sun and the warm waters of the Atlantic will find everything they're looking for right outside the doors.

Standard - 4_Star - A cozy, contemporary oasis, the Standard Room offers your choice of a single queen (2 by 1.5 meters) or two twin beds (roughly 2 X 1 meters) and a luxurious bathroom complete with a bathtub, cosmetic mirror and hair dryer. Stay productive on the road with a work desk and free wireless internet access, or unwind in front of the TV with a refreshment from the minibar. A range of amenities deliver all the comfort and convenience of home, from air conditioning to keep you cool to a personal safe to secure your valuables. Select rooms also include a private terrace overlooking sunny La Naval Street.
Single - 4_Star - Standard Room offers a plush single bed (1.9 X 1 meters), a cozy, contemporary dcor, and a luxurious bathroom complete with a bathtub, cosmetic mirror and hair dryer. Stay productive on the road with a work desk and free wireless internet access, or unwind in front of the TV with a refreshment from the minibar. A wide array of thoughtful amenities ensure your stay is comfortable and worry-free--from air conditioning to keep you cool to a personal safe to secure your valuables.
Superior - 4_Star - Enjoy stunning sea views punctuated by the twinkling lights of Las Canteras Avenue and the Auditorio Alfredo Krauss with a stay in the Superior Room. This stylish retreat includes your choice of a single queen (2 X 1.5 meters) or two twin (2 X 1 meters or 1.90 X 1 meters) beds; a cozy, contemporary dcor, and a luxurious bathroom complete with a bathtub, cosmetic mirror and hair dryer. Stay productive on the road with a work desk and free wireless internet access, or unwind in the front of the TV with a refreshment from the minibar. A range of amenities ensure your stay is comfortable and worry-free, from air conditioning to keep you cool to a personal safe to secure your valuables.
Junior - 4_Star - Junior Suite provides a cozy, contemporary oasis with a king-sized bed (2 X 1.8 meters), a fully furnished lounge area and a luxurious bathroom complete with a bathtub, cosmetic mirror and hair dryer. Step out onto your private terrace, where sweeping seaside views are punctuated by the twinkling lights of Las Canteras Avenue and the striking silhouette of the Alfredo Krauss Auditorium. Stay productive on the road with a work desk and free wireless internet access, or unwind in front of the TV with a refreshment from the minibar. A range of amenities ensure your stay is relaxing and worry free, from air conditioning to keep you cool to a personal safe to secure your valuables.
